QuestData.Title: Together Again
QuestData.Description: We saw to it that the sentinel was healed and re-equipped. I already sent her back into the field.$B$BHead back up and go to Darkcloud Pinnacle. She'll meet you there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with the Feralas Sentinel at Darkcloud Pinnacle in Thousand Needles.
QuestData.RewardText: Good to see you again, $n. Let us put the fear of the Goddess into the Grimtotem.
